title: Antibody-dependent natural killer cell activation after Ebola vaccination
author: Wagstaffe; HR; Clutterbuck; EA; Bockstal; V; Stoop; JN; Luhn; K; Douoguih; M; Shukarev; G; Snape; Pollard; AJ; Riley
description: Background Antibody Fc-mediated functions, such as antibody-dependent cellular cytotoxicity, contribute to vaccine-induced protection against viral infections. cleaned_text: Journal article Antibody-dependent natural killer cell activation after Ebola vaccination - Abstract: - Background Antibody Fc-mediated functions, such as antibody-dependent cellular cytotoxicity, contribute to vaccine-induced protection against viral infections. Fc-mediated function of anti-Ebola glycoprotein (GP) antibodies suggest that Fc-dependent activation of effector cells, including natural killer (NK) cells, could play a role in vaccination against Ebola virus disease. Methods We analyzed the effect on primary human NK cell act...
